# hour(_:)

**Instance Method**

Modifies the date format style to use the specified hour format style.

## Declaration

```swift
func hour(_ format: Date.FormatStyle.Symbol.Hour = .defaultDigits(amPM: .abbreviated)) -> Date.FormatStyle
```

## Parameters

- **format**: The hour format style applied to the date format style.

## Return Value

A date format style modified to include the specified hour style.

## Discussion

Values of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Hour] are [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Hour/defaultDigitsNoAMPM] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Hour/twoDigitsNoAMPM].

Static methods that return [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Hour] objects include [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Hour/conversationalDefaultDigits(amPM:)], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Hour/conversationalTwoDigits(amPM:)], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Hour/defaultDigits(amPM:)], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Hour/twoDigitsNoAMPM].

This example shows a variety of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Hour] format styles applied to a date:

```swift
let meetingDate = Date() // Feb 9, 2021 at 7:00 PM
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().hour(.defaultDigitsNoAMPM)) 
// 7

meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().hour(.twoDigitsNoAMPM)) 
// 07

meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().hour(.defaultDigits(amPM: .narrow))) 
// 7p

meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().hour(.twoDigits(amPM: .abbreviated))
// 07 PM

meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().hour(.conversationalDefaultDigits(amPM: .wide))
// 7 P.M.
```

If you don’t provide a format, the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Minute/defaultDigits] static variable is the default format.

For more information about formatting dates, see [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle].

## Specifying the Time Format

- **minute(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified minute format style.
- **second(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified second format style.
- **secondFraction(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified second fraction format style.
- **timeZone(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified time zone format style.
- **Date.FormatStyle.TimeStyle**: Type that defines time styles varied in length or components included.
